The Company offers you a remuneration of Rs. {{doc.ctc}}. /- ({{frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.ctc)}}) per year, as per the pay structure annexed herewith.

You will be assigned at our client’s office viz. {{doc.invoice or ''}}. The nature of work and responsibilities will be assigned and explained to you by your superior at our client’s office from time to time. You will work at high standard of initiative, creativeness, efficiency and economy in the organization

You are required to work on 6 days a week and to adhere the working hours, as stipulated by our client.


You will be covered under Group Personal Accident scheme.


You will be entitled for 12 days leave per calendar year on pro-rated basis.

Your employment with us will be governed by the Rules & Regulations of our company.


You will not be entitled to any other allowances / benefits other than specified in this letter and in the annexed pay structure.

Though you have been engaged to a specific position, the company reserves the right to send you on deputation/transfer/assignment to any of the company’s branch offices / other clients’ offices in India or abroad, whether existing at the time of your appointment or to be set up in the future.

The contractual employment can be terminated by either of us by giving one month prior notice in writing.


Your contractual employment with us will cease on completion of {{doc.period or ''}} years from your date of joining unless it is renewed / extended by us. Your contractual employment is based on the contract awarded to us by our client and in the event of termination of entire contract or part thereof by our client, your contractual employment with us can be terminated by us with one month prior notice in writing.


Your signing this appointment letter confirms your acceptance of the terms and conditions and that you would be joining the company on the given date.


Thanking you,


Yours sincerely,
For {{ doc.company }}




K GOPALAKRISHNAN
DIRECTOR
